description: The first video I published on YouTube (on Angular.JS directives and data-binding) seemed to be going very well. This made me easily fall into the issue I avoided before, which is worrying too much about what might follow. To get that worry off me, I chose a simple topic targeting different audience...

data.message: Pretty cool! The length is awesome too, I think most tip talks should not exceed 10 mins. A hot herb could help with the throat dryness. Good talk.
